11111111.content:
Kari and Angewomon walk over to the weird factory and with ease enter the run down but semi-operational factory. As the two girls walk through the factory they come across a weird machine. The machine consist of one large transparent chamber and a small computer device next to it. On the computer there is a few buttons. The three buttons says, "stretch gas, stretch and fill." The chamber itself is large enough to fit an entire parade balloon in at a fully inflated size. Kari and Angewomon get closer to the machine and Kari says, "What this?"
Angewomon: "It looks like a area where they used to make parade balloons."

Upon pressing this button, inside the chamber four metal arms come out of the walls of the chamber and grabs both of Kari's arms and her legs. The arms then lift Kari up off the ground about five feet into the air and each arms gives a slight tug on each of Kari's limbs making her arms and legs straightened out. Angewomon runs over to the chamber to make sure Kari is alright and for now, she's fine and smiling. From the ceiling of the chamber a hose drops down and hits Kari's clothes with some weird gas. After which the hose goes into Kari's mouth and pumps the same gas into Kari's body. Nothing happens at first but then suddenly Kari begins to inflate like a small blow-up doll. Her hands, feet and head remain un-inflated but the rest of her body is inflating big and round. Kari doesn't inflate for long as her body becomes filled and might pop if she gets any bigger. The inflation stops and the hose is removed from her mouth. Kari is extremely light and her body would be floating if she wasn't still being held in place. Her body is only about five feet wider then she used to be and is only somewhat round, her chest got blown up too but not more then a few centimeters.

Kari: "Oh my... I"m a balloon! Angewomon! Look at me!" Unfortunately the chamber is sound proof and Angewomon can't hear Kari but she can sees her partner's inflated body. Angewomon look over to the machine to continue the process and she hits the "stretch" button. This causes the arms holding Kari to pull at her body, stretching her body in four directions but not very far. Kari's body only streches a few centimeters but the machine keeps pulling at her and slowly Kari begins to stretch more and more. With each pull, Kari seems to be able to stretch her body a little more. This continues until Kari is stretch to the size of the entire chamber. Kari's is really stretched out but Kari seems completely fine. The metal arms hold on to Kari as to more arms appear and grab Kari's chest stretching it the same way and to the same length.

The machine holds Kari like this for a little and then let's go causing Kari to snap back into her original shape. The metal arms go back into the walls and Kari gets to her feet. Kari looks at herself and sees her body is rubbery and she now as a small barely noticeable hourglass figure even though her chest is flat still.

Angewomon is amazed by what happened to Kari and....

1121.content:
It had been hours since Amy transformed.

-----

Earlier, before Amy went to bed, she heard a noise fron the living room. When she decided to investigate, she saw someone in black clothes, apparently a thief. When the person, a boy her age, saw Amy, he turned and fled outside.

Normally Amy would've called the police, but she had a hunch that there was something else going on. In her experience as a Sailor, she associated strange outfits with a super evil. So Amy transformed and went outside. Sure enough, the boy and already leapt onto a rooftop.

'Good thing there's no school tommorrow.' Amy thought.

-----

Amy's chase ended when the boy entered an abandoned warehouse. Amy noted this with a slight mix of annoyance and hope. The lack or originality could mean that the boy isn't much of a fighter.

Before entering the warehouse, Amy turned on her computer and visor. She scanned the interior, and the only things that stood out were the boy and the wet cement at the back half of the warehouse. Next, Amy tried her communicator, but all she heard was static.

'I should've known.' Amy thought. Since there were no other options, Amy entered the warehouse.

-----

"I see you decided to come inside." The boy said, a cocky smirk on his face. "I was wondering what kept you."

"Why is it that whenever I fight someone, they always have an ego?" Amy asked no one in particular.

The boy shrugged his shoulders. "If I knew, or cared for that matter, I'd tell you." With that, the boy raised his arm. The door that he and Amy entered through closed tight.

Amy knew she had no other choice now. "Shine Aqua Illusion!" She cried, lauching an ice-cold blast of water at the boy.

"WHOA!" The boy shouted in surprise, throwing his arms in front of him. Even though Amy's attack was sudden, the boy was able to catch it, and now held it over his head. He used a black colored energy bolt to shape the attack into a sphere. "I'll admit that was good, but I've got something that's better."

"Like what?" Amy asked.

"Just watch!" The boy exclaimed, raising his arm to throw Amy's attack back at her.

Amy realized this, and jumped over the boy's head and landed behind him. She knew the cement was still wet, but she could still move around if she go out fast enough. She thought she was fine until she saw that her attack was still in the boy's hand; he only pretended to throw.

"Smart move there." The boy said, firing the ice water into the cement. Thanks to the energy the boy added, the cement froze over before Amy could react. "Predictable, but smart."

Amy had only one idea for this situation. With no hesitation, she launched her Mercury Bubbles.

The boy caught them as well. The smirk had left his face, leaving a more embarrassed look. "Look, I have no intention to kill you. I was just bored so I decided to have some fun."

Amy blinked in confusion.

"You always seemed to have your nose stuffed in a book, I just thought you deserved this more than some other girls I've seen." The boy said, walking over to Amy. He looked like he was blushing.

'I don't believe it.' Amy realized in shock. 'He did all this to ask me out.'

-----

Once Amy was in reaching distance, the boy picked one of the bubbles with his free hand.

He raised a bubble just above Amy's bow. Amy watched it, and then it slipped down her uniform, and entered her left nipple. Amy yelped and before she knew it, her breast had inflated. The boy repeated this with Amy's right breast. Amy now had volleyball sized breasts.

"Cool huh?" The boy asked as Amy felt her breasts up. "It's a little trick I created."

Amy nodded slowly. It didn't hurt or anything, it was just new to her.

"Do you want to continue?" The boy asked eagerly.

Amy nodded again, at a faster speed. She might as well go along with him, she couldn't leave. Besides, this could be fun.

"Great. How do you want to be inflated: fill your body until your round, or get a large hourglass figure?"
1121.title: An actual use for Mercury Bubbles( LONG set up her

choices: At the limit- get rid of the other bubbles
11211.content:
"I think I'll try being round." Amy answered.

"I can deal with that." The boy said, grabbing another bubble. He placed the bubble in front of Amy's mouth. "Now just open up and don't inhale."

Amy opened her mouth, allowing the bubble to enter her. The bubble moved down her throat and filled up her body.

Amy pressed her hand against her belly. "I never thought that this was possible."

"You'd be surprised." The boy said as he inserted another bubble. "I've been working on this trick for a few years now."

Amy now looked impossibly huge. "I can see that."

-----

It had been an hour since they started. The boy had been nice enough to release Amy's feet from the cement. Amy had grown much larger, now she was round, just like she asked. The downside was that, with all the internal pressure, her panties had snapped, exposing her butt and her front. Amy was grateful to whatever Powers That Be that the it wasn't loud enough to attract the boy's attention.

"How do you feel?" The boy asked.

"Hmm?"

"Do you want to keep going, or do you feel too full to keep inflating?" The boy asked. "We still have two thirds of the bubbles left."
11211.title: Now she's starting to look like Mercury

112111.content:
I think I should quit now. Amy thought. But at that moment, she started to feel dizzy. Before she realized it, she entered a trance.

"Well?" The boy asked. Like I don't know already.

Amy shook her head to snap out of said trance. "You can use all the bubbles. I want to be huge."

"I can do that." The boy said, grabbing a bubble.

Amy just opened her mouth and took in the bubble. She grew slightly, but not enough for it to be seen.

"It's fun being brainwashed by an altered attack, isn't it Amy?" The boy asked.

Amy didn't reply. All she did was open her mouth.

-----

In five minutes time, the boy had fed Amy all of her bubbles. She had grown to triple her size. Needless to say, the boy noticed her panties.

"Well that was fun." The boy said with a smirk on his face. "Now should I try one of her friends, minus that pink haired one, or just take her away for some playtime?"

Amy just cooed slightly.
112111.title: Aside from Amy, something's up

choices: It's getting late, and I can use a bed.
Let's see how big you can get.
1121111.content:
'If i decide to get more of her friends, they might come in numbers, outnumbering me. Seperating them can be plausible. No, they can probably contact each other.' the boy thought to himself. 'Besides,' he turn to Amy and blush, 'I got what I came here for. Best to leave.'

With a snap of his fingers a portal wide enough to get the balloon scout through appear out of nowhere. Amy, still in a trance, can only marvel at the stunt. The boy than went to his balloon and lifted her with little difficulty, "Time to take you to your new home, my beautiful sphere." Soon the duo disappeared within the void. Soon the portal began to close itself.

However, the boy came back to grab the discarded clothing that was left behind at the scene due to Amy's inflation. "Must not leave any traces of what just happen here." the boy said to himself while gathering the scout's clothing she might have left behind. When all of the clothing was obtain the boy went back into the vortex which close up soon after.

Inside the portal was an vast void that seem to go on forever. It's not to say it was entirely dull or lifeless. There was an area with a tv that was floating, another area that was model after a kitchen (with appliances, refrigerator, and all), an eclose area that had a label titled "washroom" on it, all and all it had a bit of a home-y feel to it.

"Feels good to be back," the boy said to himself, he than look at the garments he got from the scene, "My balloon will no longer need these anymore." He than toss the clothes behind him, snap his fingers, and the clothes disappear in a explosion of fire. "Speakin of which," he turn his attention Amy, noticing that she was naked, he gave a snap of his fingers, "You'll need a more proper garmet."

Amy snap out of her trance when she felt like a fluid substance crawling all over her skin. It didn't feel bad, actually it felt kinda good. She writhe in pleasure as the liquid cover her bare skin. It had a warm, covering feeling to every square inch of skin that it cover.

The boy watch with a smile on his face as the liquid that he had summon cover the balloon girl. Though he did enjoy watching his partner inflate, he also wanted a sense of modesty, hence the liquid. It was going to be her now form a clothing. A outfit mad so that it stretches as mush as she stretches, there was absolutely no limit to how far the material can stretch. "And done." The boy said to himself as the substance was done covering the balloon girl. It didn't cover her entirely, just enough that if she was back to her normal form, it would look like a one-piece bathing suit.

Amy gave a sigh when her sense of pleasure was over, she did enjoy it, but now she was a prisoner and a balloon. Though she had to admit, at least the boy got her some form of clothing. "Perhaps I can probably get partially use to this." she said to her self. The boy than appear right infront of her face, "Don't worry I'll make sure your time here is an enjoyable one. You'll be one happy balloon." Amy gave a faint blush as she look away, "I see, can you atleast tell what are going to do me next?"

The boy scratch his chin a bit, "Well..."
1121111.title: Play

choices: Make Amy into an inflatable bed.
Make Amy into an inflatable couch.
11211111.content:
...it's getting late, and I can use a bed." the boy finished as he gave a stretch. He than turn to the balloon scout, "Do you want to help me out with that request?" "It's not like I have much of a choice now do I? But yes, I'll go along." Amy answer politely. The boy gave a chuckle, "Seems so, but I'm glad you understand." The boy than gave a snap of his fingers.

Within the empty space next to him, a device similar to a hi-tech trash compactor appear next to him. Amy, who was able to see despite her massive, inflated form, was puzzled at the sight. The boy turn to his favourite balloon, "Like it, I made it myself. It's said it can convert any someone of your status into any form I choose." Amy tried to nod her head, than she relieze something, "You do know that I'm way too big for such a device." "You're right," the boy said before giving a snap of his fingers, "but that could be remedy."

Amy felt strange, a feeling of emptyness coming over her. It didn't take long for her to notice her balloon body deflating. Within minutes Amy went from massive blimp to a crumble sheet of plastic. Even her face wasn't spare from the treatment. Her face, along with her hands and feet, was also deflated and flat.

The boy than went and roll up the Amy sheet and folded her just so her face was on the top of the pile.

"Are you okay?" The boy ask infront of Amy's face. The face somehow nodded, "Yeah, it's a new sensation to me, deflating and all." The boy nodded as acknowledgement and open the lid of the compactor-device. He than stuff Amy into it. Before the lid was close Amy was able to ask if this thing was tested before. The boy thought to himself before looking slightly nervous, "Actually this is the device's maiden voyage, so something might go wrong." He immeditely slam the lid before Amy started protesting.

Going over to the control panel, the boy look over the options for the finish product.

"What be perfect right now for some sleep?"
11211111.title: Getting ready for bed.

11211112.content:
"...let's see how big you can get." the boy said with a smile. Amy's face turn pale, "Are you joking, what happens if I explode, I don't want to die like that." Amy wave her hands as a means to propel herself away from the boy, she didn't even move an inch. The boy only smile, "Don't worry. Though it's true you can explode by going over your limit, you won't die." The boy's made Amy stop her struggling. "That's the beauty of my powers. Even if your body goes beyond your limits, you'll just be reduce to fragments of rubber for a moment before reforming. In a sense I turn you into a balloon version of yourself. You'll never die, you'll never grow old because you're no longer human." Amy's head was sprialing at the information she just receive, 'I'm nothing more than a mass of rubber.' The boy saw the shock look on the balloon girl's face, he patted her head, "Don't worry, I might have something that can cheer you up." He gave a snap of his fingers and a small tank materialize in his right hand. Amy gave a puzzle look, the boy chuckle, "Don't worry, this canister can hold a million times more than what you have." Amy didn't get a chance to speak before the boy force a lose down her mouth. She felt a form of gas going into her and instantely felt her very form expand. A wave of pleasure enter her mind as every inch of her body stretch to accomidate the entering gas. When she first enter the void she was approx. 75 ft. in diameter, now she was going beyond 200 ft. Her mind was a haze of pleasure, she couldn't think straight, all she wanted was to expand and inflate.

The boy watch from infront of Amy's face as his balloon girl grew bigger and bigger with each passing second. He enjoy the look of bliss on the girls face as her body swell past 350 ft. her body creaking as the inflation continue. When it was reaching 500 ft the boy watch as Amy's face began to spread and began to meld with her body, he than flew to where her hands and feet should be to find that they have already gotten absorb into her orb body. He also notice that her blue rubber outfit look like it was painted on. He flew back to Amy's face to see that her head has become part of her body, leaving her eyes, nose, mouth,etc looked like they were painted on. Yet depite becoming a total orb, her face didn't show any worry or care that she was a sphere measuring about 700 ft and growing, she just wanted to savor the moment. "Guess your enjoying the balloon treatment my dear." The boy said with a smile. Amy only gave a moan as a response. Satisfy, the boy decided to float infront of her and enjoy her expansion, and listen to the creeking of her rubber body as contiune to contain more air.

Time pass as the balloon scout continue to take in air like a sponge, 600, 700, 800, 900, the orb continue to expand. The boy was surprise that the girl was able to hold that much air within herself. 'She almost reach the 1000 ft mark, I wonder how much she can...'

BOOM!

The boy didn't have to finish that thought as Amy exploded into thousands upon thousands of rubbery shards. The force of the explosion cause the boy (along with anything else nearby) to be flung back thousands of feet into the void. While the shock wasn't lethal or actually dangerous, it felt like getting punch really hard to the boy. The sound was also deafening, but the boy remain unphazed. After it was over, the boy found himself surrounded by rubbery blue and flesh color shards. "Guess 1000ft was her limit, that was fairly big." the boy said passively as he flick a rubber fragment off himself, he than look around himself to find rubber pieces all over him, "Time to fix her." He gave a quick snap of his fingers.

As if by command, every shard that was Amy began to converge onto a single infront of the boy. The shards began to fuse into a rubber blob of blue and a color that was the same as the Amy's skin. The blob than stretch and form into a female human shape. Than the form's features shifted and form into Amy and her one piece blue swimsuit=like attire. She had a blissful look on her face, her eyes were half-lidden. She ran a hand through her hair, "My that was quite a rush. It felt so good to explode like that. I flet every piece of me drift and float along. It was so wonderful." The boy smile before giving a quick yawn, Amy look at him, "You seem tired." The boy nodded, "It seems that by locating and melding back every piece of your body, it appears that I exhausted a good amount of power. I must rest so I can play with you later." The boy than flew towards a floating "room" that was nearby and lay on the bed. "Where do I sleep?" Amy questioned as the boy pull the sheets over his head. "You can float around here as a means to sleep. I'm actually kind of sorry that I don't have a bed ready for you." The boy return. Amy mearly shrug it off and decided to just sleep while floating in the void. Her body aimlessly floating as she drifted off to sleep, 'I wonder what's going to happen to me tomorrow.'
11211112.title: A boy and his balloon.

1121112.content:
I think I'll get the other girls here before I do anything. The boy thought. "But the question is who?" The boy had watched Amy's friends before, and they each posed their own problems.

There was Sailor Moon for one thing, but she had more power than the other girls. There was also the problem of her teammates showing up. If anything, he would have to wait until the others were out of the way before he went after her. That way she wouldn't have any backup.

Jupiter was the second toughest member of the group, being the tallest and the strongest. She also had a talent for combat. Plus her electric attacks would be harder to deal with than those of the other girls. That left him with Sailor Mars and Sailor Venus.

"I guess I can lure both of them here." The boy said, forming his own energy bubble.

-----

Two hours later, Raye and Lina arrived at the warehouse.

"Are you sure that called from here?" Lina asked.

Raye nodded. "I saw her face in her communicator. But what would she be doing way out here?"

"You got me." Said Lina. Lina then notice that the others weren't here. "Hey, where are Serena and Lita?"

Raye looked around the surrounding area. "I don't know. Do you think they got Amy's call?"

"I guess not." Lina replied. "But we should go in and find Amy."

"I agree."

Once inside the warehouse, neither Lina or Raye could see any sign that anyone even entered the building. All they saw was a tarp covering some balloon-like object.

This is weird. Lina noted.

Before either had a chance to react, they were knocked down by a large, black bubble. Once the girls had been fully engulfed, the bubble split and carried the girls to opposite sides of the warehouse. Raye's bubble was too thick for her to see through, but Lina could.

-----

Raye tried to break out, but she couldn't concentrate for some reason. Then, the bubble began to shrink; Raye felt the air inside become thicker. But instead of crushing her, her body was breaking out of the bubble, it wasn't showing any signs of popping however. The bubble kept shrinking until her limbs were free.Then it disappeared into her body.

That's when Raye inflated into a round shape.

On the other side of the warehouse, Lina saw Raye's inflation as her bubble began to shrink. Although she was in a partial trance, she wasn't able to free herself before she inflated as well.

"Well that was easy." A voice said. Lina followed the voice over to the tarp. Then a boy about her age walked out. "I guess now I should take care of Jupiter and Sailor Moon now."

Lina watched as the boy removed the tarp, revealing Amy. She gasped in shock.

Unfortuantely for her, the boy heard her.
1121112.title: Well, Venus and Mars are ready, what next?

11211121.content:
"Oh great." The boy said. "I guess I put too much into Mars's half of the bubble to render you unconscious."

"Who are you!?" Lina snapped. "And what's this about!?"

"If you want to call me something, call me Tom." He answered. "As for the inflation part, it's just something I like to do."

"Why are you targeting just the Sailors?" Lina asked. She had calmed down a bit.

"I was just curious what you'd look like all inflated in those suits of yours." Said Tom.

Lina stared at Ray for a moment. "Okay. Do you honestly think that the other two Sailors will be as easy to capture?"

Tom shrugged his shoulders. "Maybe, maybe not. I made the force field outside so it could block that one guy who bails you and your teammates out of danger, so I have a good chance of succeeding."

Oh great. Lina thought.

"But I do have an offer." Tom said. "If you agree to become my personal servant, I'll let the others go, and I won't go after either Moon or Jupiter."

Lina would've backed away if she could. "Servant!?!"

Ray nodded. "That's right. I'll take you back to my place. You'll do what I tell you when I tell you. And I get to inflate you whenever I want as well. If you do well I'll even let you decide how you want to be inflated."

Lina looked down at her already bloated body. She obviously didn't like the thought of this boy doing what he wanted, but it would spare her friends some grief.

"Inflating shouldn't be too bad once you get used to it." Tom said. "You might even get to enjoy being filled with air."

"I guess." Lina muttered. She whined for her next sentence. "But I don't want to pop."

"Don't worry about that." Tom said, forming a bubble. "I can improve your capacity so that popping wouldn't matter."

Lina attempted to move forward. "Well, I admit that this doesn't feel bad. In fact it's kinda nice, but you're asking for a lot."

Tom walked up to Lina and pushed his free hand against her belly. It sank in to his elbow. "You like the way you are?"

"I guess."

Tom pushed his bubble into Lina's body. Once inside, the pressure inside Lina built up until Tom's hand was pushed out completely. Lina couldn't help but moan as this happened. She was now big and very taut. And she enjoyed it.

"So what's your answer?"
11211121.title: She has questions, he has answers

112111211.content:
Lina thought it over for five minutes. Then she answered. "I'll do it. Just leave my friends alone."

"That's fine by me." Said Tom as he walked to Amy. He put a hand on her body, and Amy started to deflate. The air that was in her took the form of a large bubble. He repeated this with Raye, and merged the bubbles together. The girls just stood still, silently.

"Now what?" Lina asked.

"Simple." Tom answered. "For my first order, I want you to open your mouth so you can absorb the bubble."

Lina gulped quietly and did as told.

-----

It had been two hours since Amy and Raye were taken back home. Lina had absorbed the bubble, and was five times her previous size. Her uniform had been torn off halfway through, leaving only her gloves, shoes, and her tiara.

Content with his night out, Tom deflated Lina and took her back home. What he has Lina do there is a mystery, but she didn't mind. She had saved her friends by her own sacrifice. Besides, at least she had a mutual interest with her new owner...
112111211.title: I couldn't think of a title

112111212.content:
"I won't do it!" Lina shouted defiantly. "There's no way you can get all of the Sailors!"

Tom sighed in annoyance. He didn't want to be here any for this long. He just upped
the power of his spell and hypnotized Lina. "Now move over to your friend on the
other side of the warehouse."

"Okay." Lina said as she waddled off to Raye.

Now I just have to get the other two girls out here. Tom thought. But first
I should get the girls at equal sizes. "Hey, Mercury!"

"Yes?" Amy answered.

"Blow half of you air into Mars!" Tom ordered. He had to shout so that Amy could
hear him from up there. "Then put the rest into Venus, I'll reinflate you later!"

Amy waddled so that she was in front of Raye and then tipped over. The two kissed,
providing a channel for Amy to blow into Raye with. Amy repeated this with Lina.
She then walked over to Tom to be reinflated.

"Well, after I get your friends the fun can really start." Tom said as he formed a
bubble.
112111212.title: No(And can someone else add to this storyline?)

choices: Bring both Uieah, and Rey to Rey's Shrine.
Rey thinks of a better place to go.
1122.content:
(coming from early episodes.) The queen of the negaverse was hard at work trying to break the sailor scouts confidence and collect energy once again for who knows what. When all of a sudden..

She tried to move around but it only resulted her ball shaped body to wobble around. "I can feel the air circulating inside of me." She giggled, joyfully flapping her hands. "If only I could get bigger. Oh wait, the helium tank! Hey Peach! Roll me over to the helium tank."

Peach looked back and forth between the stationary tank and the orange sphere princess. A sly grin appeared on the blonde’s face as she thought of a devious plan. With Daisy's current situation, she would be powerless to stop Peach from playing with her sphere body. Then again, she could seek revenge on Daisy by inflating her with the helium tank until she bursts. After careful thinking, Peach walked towards the giddy balloon with her decision set in stone.
11312212.title: A Daisy Turned Round

choices: Peach inflates Daisy with the helium tank.
113122121.content:
“I’m not going to inflate you Daisy. In fact, I have something better in store for you.” Peach stated. She picked up the very light princess.

“Umm Peach, what are you doing?”

“Why I’m playing with my new ball.” Peach answered. With all of her might, she slammed the humanoid orange ball into the ground. Her body compressed from the impact before she rocketed into the air. Peach watched the screaming Daisy traveled higher and higher until she became a mere dot in the sky. A few sound later, the sound of someone screaming could be heard. Peach backed away as the dot came closer to the ground. The moment Daisy made contact with the terrain, it sent her body bouncing all over the place. She bounced uncontrollably around the castle yard, crashing into every bush and tree in her way. The poor inflated woman could only screamed in absolute terror as she continued to helplessly bounce with no end in sight. Luckily, a pair of hands caught her in time to end her torture.

“Did you have fun exploring the castle yard?” Asked a certain blonde cladded in pink.

Daisy turned her head and saw a very smug Peach staring at her. “You. What was that all about?!!” she shouted.

“Like I said, I wanted to play with my new ball.”

“I may look and feel like one but I am NOT a ball! Change me back to normal now!”

“Not happening. Consider this payback for popping me earlier.” Peach placed the balloon princess on her the ground, her face staring at the castle wall. She walked around Daisy until she was standing behind her. “Now let’s see what kind of underwear you’re hiding.” She taunted.

“What? No! Leave my panties alone!” yelled Daisy.

Her cries would go unheard. Peach hiked up the orange dress, revealing Daisy’s orange polka dot panties. “I didn’t know you had a thing for polka dots. I must say they looked quite on you” She snickered as she smacked the panty covered butt.

“EEP! Knock it off!” barked the red-faced Daisy.

“Oh relax. It’s just some harmless teasing.” Peach reasoned. She slapped Daisy’s rump again, causing the inflated princess to let another shriek. “Besides, you should be more concerned with what’s in front of you.”

“I’m staring at a wall. Why should I be worried about?” questioned Daisy. She thought about what Peach said before her eyes widen in realization. “Peach, NOOO!!!” She was too late. The moment she screamed, Peach kicked the ballooned woman’s polka dotted butt. Daisy was sent flying towards, screaming as she was rapidly approaching the castle wall. She collided with the wall face first before ricocheting off with a “boing” sound. Reeling from the impact, Daisy was too groggy to see Peach setting up for another kick. Her eyes nearly popped out her head when her face met the bone-crushing force of Peach’s foot, hurling Daisy right back to the stone wall.

And so began the excited game of Kick the Daisy. The inflated princess was at the mercy of the impromptu game. Every time Peach kicked her to the wall, her body would produce a “boing” noise before bouncing off the wall. Just as Daisy was about to touch the ground, there stood Peach, in prime position to kick the sphere shaped woman and renew the cycle. After thirty excruciating minutes of incessant kicking and bouncing, Peach caught the tormented Daisy and laid her down on the ground.

“Whew, that was fun. What did you think Daisy?” Peach asked.

“Everything’s spinning.” Moaned Daisy. Peach’s kickball session left the sphere princess dizzy as evident by her swirling eyes.

“Oh you poor thing. Don’t worry I know just the thing to clear your senses.”
113122121.title: Playtime With The Orange Sphere

Peach grabbed the helium tank before running back to Daisy. She placed down the tank and carefully put the hose into the dazed woman's mouth. "All right Daisy, this should clear your head.” Peach said as she turned on the helium tank.

“Mmrph?” muttered the now clear-headed Daisy when a rush of helium traveled to her mouth. Her cheeks suddenly puffed out as her body began expanding outwards in all directions. Searching for the source of the helium, she heard a startling “You-hoo!” She turned to the source of the noise and immediately felt a sense of anger and annoyance. Standing in front of Daisy was Peach, waving at the ballooning woman while standing next to the helium tank. In a fit of rage, Daisy mumbled loudly at the pink princess, frantically flapping her hands and feet.

Peach was laughing at the spherical woman’s antics. “Huh? I can’t hear you. Speak louder.” She goaded. Irate with Peach’s unwillingness to cooperate, Daisy started screaming at the blond princess.

“What’s that? You want to get bigger? Well, why didn’t you say so?” Peach taunted. She grabbed of hold of the valve and cranked it to full blast.

Daisy’s eyes bulged out of the head as the helium blasted into her mouth. Her dress struggled to contain her expanding body as it rapidly inflates. She was losing contact with the ground as the helium inside hoists her body into the air.

“My, look how big you got Daisy.” mocked Peach. In the span of half a minute, Daisy went from a prone orange ball to a floating orange weather balloon. At fifteen feet in diameters, she hovered as the hose anchored her in place. Daisy’s dress rode up behind her; her orange polka dot panties were on full display. She glared down at the blond princess, but her puffy cheeks made look her more adorable and less intimidating.

“Well, as much as I love watching you inflate, I think it’s time to put this spectacle to an end.” Peach said. The floating spherical woman continued to glare at Peach. After everything the blonde did to her, it’s logical for her to be suspicious. As Peach walked towards the buoyant female, Daisy prepared herself for what the pink princess had in store.

Besides working at the Gelateria, she helped the eccentric entepenur Wario, of the company of the same name, design odd little 5 second games that would later be grouped together and sold. "Hmph. If they think they're going to catch me, think again!" Mona hit a small blue button on the side of her handlebar. "Time to try the helium balloon addition..."

Mona's scooter was no ordinary scooter. It had been constantly reworked to contain tricks and gizmos that would put Pee Wee's bike to shame. The latest was one Mona was particuarly proud of. A hose would come out of the back of her seat, and a balloon from a small compartment nearby. The balloon, being a very special extra-strength one, would hold the helium easily, and after holding enough, would hopefully allow for an easy escape. However, she left out one important thing: SHE was sitting on the seat as well.

Mona felt something brush against her back. "Oh, that must be the balloon. But where's the- EEK!"

Mona yelped as she felt something cold and tubeshaped jam itself up her rear- the hose. A dull hissing was heard as helium crept up into her body. Mona couldn't help but look down and watch.

The helium began by stretching out her thighs and rear, lifting her a good five inches higher off the seat. Some of it began to go through her legs, stretching them out like long tubes, before ending at her feet, puffing them out and bursting her shoes off.

Her belly expanded slighty next, as the helium worked it's way up her body. Her belt strained slightly, but the gas continued higher, puffing her breasts out as well.

"How... How is this possible?" Mona started to question, but then remembered some of the other strange characters that lived in Diamond City. If anthropomorphic Dogs and Cats, evil geniuses, aliens, and disco dancers existed, surely a few more things were possible than expected.

Mona's cheeks puffed out as the helium finally reached her head. Her vision blurred slightly as she felt her face stretch out as her head became a giagantic, peach colored sphere, with her face painted on the front. Her helmet fell off, letting her long red hair fly free on the top of her head.

As the helium shut off, most of the gas had settled in either her head or her feet. Her head was easily four times the size of the rest of her body, and each foot was now an oblong shaped balloon with sausage-like toes, each foot about half the size of the scooter. Struggling, she felt her grip weaken, and she finally let go of the handlebars, letting herself fly free up into the air. Her scooter skidded into some bushes on the side of the road, and the bewildered police halted their chase.

As she began to drift through the air, Mona tried to assess her situation. She now looked like some bizzare hot air balloon. "Oh well," she said, amazed that the opening of her mouth didn't let any air out. "At least it wasn't painful. Now then..."

143121212.content:
A large mass of bubbles rose up to the surface of the water, followed close behind by the large beast that created them. With a rumbling growl, the horned shell of the monstrous squid peirced the water.

"Cap'n!" Jennings yelled. "Kraken! Dead ahead!"

"What?!" Syrup ran to the front of the boat. "Well, turn the ship!"

"Aye aye!" Jennings nodded. "ALL HANDS ON DECK!" Various members of the Black Sugar Gang began priming cannons, reading harpoons, and the like. Meanwhile, Jennings cranked the wheel hard to the right- perhaps too hard.

"Ack!" Syrup stumbled to the left as the massive waves formed by the Kraken's surfacing smashed against the boat mid-turn. In a flash, she dropped over the edge of the ship, and into the briney sea.

"CAP'N!" A random member of the crew rushed to the side of the ship. "Hang on!" A rope was hastily thrown over the side of the ship.

"Great." Syrup groaned. "And the day had begun so well, too." She swam over and grabbed the rope, but at the same time felt a tentacle wrap around her right leg. Gasping, Syrup was suddenly dragged under. The rope followed her down, as there was a long length of it left on the ship.

As she began to sink below, Syrup struggled with the tentalce wrapped around her foot. Her breath was running out, as was the rope.

Suddenly, the amulet around her neck began to glow. Gasping at the sight, Syrup felt the salty sea water go down her throat... and through the rest of her body.

This confused Syrup. She now felt the coldness of the water on the inside of her body as well, but inside her feet. It was almost as if her body had become hollow. Intrigued, and almost forgetting about her current situation, Syrup opened her mouth wide, letting the water in.

The sudden entrance of the water expanded Syrup's body greatly. Her body rounded out and her legs disappeared. This left the Kraken nothing to hold onto, and the tentacle slipped out from around Syrup. Feeling this, Syrup felt quite relieved, and began swimming toward the surface. It was an amusing sight, as the water sloshed through her body, enlarging different parts of her body. Finally, she surfaced, and tugged on the rope.

"Cap'n!" Jennings smiled, looking down at her. "Hang on, we'll pull you up!"

Syrup sighed as she felt herself rise out of the water- then yelped as the rope suddenly, jerked. Looking down at herself, she found out why.

The water inside her body, now very susceptible to gravity, had all stuck itself into Syrup's legs and feet. Her legs stretched a good two feet more than they used to, ending with two massive spheres with toes where her feet used to be.

"Geez, I don't mean to be rash, but the Captain needs to lose a little weight!" A random goom said as he hoisted up the rope.

"I'll say. I mean, what has she been eat... ing?" The crew fell silent as Syrup flopped over the edge of the ship, landing on deck with a wet plop.

Some of the water moved from her legs to her head as she lay dazed on the deck, filling out her cheeks, and causing her face to swell outward. As she stood up, most water flowed into her feet, making each of them almost half the size of her body. Her head, though sagging and stretched slightly, was almost as large as that.

"..Cap'n.. What happened"

"Long story." Syrup managed through her stretched lips. "Right now..."

When she does, Palom pops out and starts to quietly read the incantation from the paper. Porom hears the last few words of Palom's incantation and turns around just to see a yellow-ish green energy ball fly at her.

"Wha!?" she cries as the ball hits her. Upon impact, it bursts in a puffy cloud that's the same color as the ball, which slowly fades. Porom sees Palom, and runs over to him with a look of annoyance on her face as Palom chuckles to himself. "Grr...all right, Palom, what are you up to this time?" she asks.

Palom finishes chuckling, and grins as he starts to talk. "Heh, you'll see...hum...I think...now." Palom says. However, instead of Porom having to pass gas, something else starts to happen. Sara was not interested in opening the letter and tossed it aside. She went about her business for the rest of the day.

In the early evening she was still at home finishing off the remains of a pizza and huge dinner. She hungrily chewed up the chewy crust while sitting back in her chair. Her hand lay strewn across her aching belly and her slender forefinger tapped on her navel, which puffed out through her midriff.

"Ooommmmph... that was a lot." Sara thought. She smacked her greasy lips and looked at the discarded, crumb-covered pizza box and plates around her. She barely heard her stomach sloshing and turned her glance back to the telegram.

What the hell, she reached over (wincing slightly from her overstuffed stomach), and plucked it up with her fingers. She tore through the gold fringe of the fancy-looking envelope and read it:

Seeking girls of good stamina for a contest that will make one contestant famous. Fabulous prizes available! Respond by so-and-so date, meet here at...

Omigod, the deadline's today and she can still make it! Sara is never one to back down from a challenge. She gets up, woozy from the huge dinner she gobbled down, and walks to her car. When she gets in and drives to the meeting location, her tight belly gurgles irritably and she wonders if this was a good idea. 1541.content:
"Congratulations are in order, Ms. Bennett. Few girls your size make ever make it to the end of the program."

The snide nurses's compliments fall on deaf ears. Jordan's mouth hangs open, her eyes glazed from lack of energy. This regimine had taken everything she had out of her. She'd had been confined to the Summerholt institute for over a month, eating nothing but beta-enriched vegetables and low-calorie fiber paste. Her violent relapse into food addiction had prompted her parents to confine her here.

"You should be pleased with yourself." the bitch continues. "Since you've been here you've reached your weight goal of 284 pounds!"

"I came in at 302." Jordan croaks.

"Well, we at Summerholt believe in keeping our aspirations realistic. Now's a good time for you to return home. The nice reporters have all left the building!."

Had she the strength, Jordan would have lunged out of her wheelchair and clawed the nurse's eyes out. Just an hour ago the staff had been showing her off to the local media as their own success story. Now they were dumping Jordan out so fast her bedsheets were still warm from when she got up.

"Now then, as long as you continue meditating three times a day, and you stick to your three-hour workout regimine and maintain a strict diet as specified in your catalog, you'll find you'll no longer suffer from sudden pangs of hunger." The skinny bitch continues to drone on, her patronizngly sweet voice dripping with pretentiousness.

Jordan looked down at her pudgy hand, which was holding a small container of pills. "How often did Dr. Clark say I should take these?" she manages to whisper.

"Those pills will continue to regulate your brain chemicals to reduce hunger." she answers back. "The doctor told me to tell you he cannot emphasize enough how important it is that your stomach shrinks back to it's original size. We don't want you going on another near-fatel binge, now do we?"

"How long it take to shrink?" Jordan asks. "They taste like sheddings in a hamster's cage."

"Oh, it varies. Trust me, you'll get used to the taste...if you try to maintain a positive attitude." Jordan gets the message. Such a question was unwelcome.

"Alright, Miss Bennett, today's the first day of the rest of your life!" The orderlies beside Jordan hoist her out of her wheelchair and toward the door. Her hollow stomach gurgles as it is jostled upward.

Three seconds later the doors of Summerholt slam shut behind her. She is left alone on the busy city streets, her knees about to buckle from under her own weight. In her purse is a bottle of pills and a big wad of cash from her parents in her purse. That money is set aside for purchasing dozens of overpriced vitamins and exercise equipment from the local GNC.

Jordan cannot believe the hell she has just gone through. For a month she has struggled to conquer her addiction surrounded by uncaring doctors and therapists, her complaints of pain ignored as her stomach walls were slowly eaten away at by it's own acids. Her tongue felt dry and abrasive from eating so much dry, flavorless food. Jordan feared that the second she caught a wiff of real, home-cooked food she would crumble and relapse back into her old routine.
